Can't remove from memory. Every time I use task manager it reloads automatically. Suspect spying on me. No reason for a game to run when I am not using it... Especially when the disclaimer says it needs full network access and to have my location... Uninstalled.... In reply to developer response, I ...Full ReviewCan't remove from memory. Every time I use task manager it reloads automatically. Suspect spying on me. No reason for a game to run when I am not using it... Especially when the disclaimer says it needs full network access and to have my location... Uninstalled.... In reply to developer response, I understand network access for ads, I do not understand why it needs to know where I am, and I do not understand why the program stays loaded when I close all programs with the task manager and it stays resident. I do not want a game to stay resident when I am not playing it and the only reason it would need to do so is to track my movements for  ads. I do not want that or will allow that.
